title: Removing dodge timers for certain game modes?
body: What would happen if dodge timers were removed? Honestly I do not feel it is fair that sometimes I have to play with trolls or people already being toxic and immature in champ select chat, forexample in blind pick two people call the same role and argue over it and one doesn’t give up the role etc or the rare occurrence in draft  were people don’t always respect the roles assigned, just in general people you really wouldn’t want to play a game with

replies.body:
If dodge timers were removed, nothing would stop people from dodging out of every slight inconvenience; the enemy picked a champion they don't like, a teammate picked a champion they won't want to play with, someone got autofilled, they got their champion banned out etc.

It would just cause games to never start and it would be the worst gaming experience you could possible have. The game will almost never go *exactly* how an individual wants it to, and people do need to make compromises sometimes.

You'd be at a higher chance of getting that exact same person and dealing with that exact same stuff unless you waited to get back in queue, which by that point might as well just deal with the dodge timer.
